text: Jorma Olavi "Jope" Ruonansuu (15 April 1964 â€“ 18 July 2020) was a Finnish actor, impressionist, musician and stand-up comedian. He was born in Kemi, Finland. He won the Best performer Venla award in 2010. In 2005, he began hosting the comedy sketch show Jopet Show. Ruonansuu was diagnosed with esophageal cancer in 2018. He died on 18 July 2020 in Helsinki from the disease, aged 56. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Finnish movie actors Category:Finnish television actors Category:Finnish stage actors Category:Finnish comedians Category:Finnish musicians Category:Finnish writers
title: Jope Ruonansuu
